Honeywell Customer Connect
Dear Honeywell Customer, I have a lot of updates to share this month. Along with these updates, I would like to invite you to join Honeywell’s online social community. Connect with over 400k followers to discuss the latest articles, announcements and unique stories covering everything from business aviation, to urban air mobility.
Follow our channels: <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> Did You Know?
Technical support made easy and personalized with Direct Access Latest Update It just got easier! Direct Access is one of Honeywell's customer support mobile apps that is available to Business & General Aviation pilots and flight departments. The app is a customer service one-stop-shop that provides aircraft-on-ground (AOG) support, order status information, helicopter support and includes an interactive map of the nearest dealers and service centers. In update 9.0, Honeywell introduced a convenient and personalized mobile experience making it easier to contact technical support and register for the local Operator Conferences. Click here for more information and to download the app <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/direct-access]]>.
FSE Creates ‘Wow’ Moments for Latin American Operators Field Service Engineer Fernando Vasquez Orellana has spent 20 years solving problems for Honeywell customers in Latin America. Currently based in Toluca, Mexico, Fernando works with business aviation operators in Mexico, Central America and the Caribbean to get them the solutions they need. Here is his story on how he works with customers in Mexico to create those “wow” moments. Read More <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/august/fse-creates-wow-moments-for-latin-american-operators]]>.
Technical Support Videos of the Month In this months’ Technical Video segment, we’re featuring the most watched video on Engine Trend Monitoring with CAMP. This video is an introduction to using the CAMP Systems website to submit engine trend data, review analysis, and begin troubleshooting fault codes using HDA.
Engine Trend Monitoring <[[http://youtu.be/S05a8Zw_6jY]]>
Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/HQ002000Z0L0bX00qFI00jG]]> to access the Technical Knowledge Center's thousands of articles and videos to help you solve technical issues, parts ordering, your order status and much more.

Mexico - 528004360128 Colombia - 018000125387 Chile - 800395072 Brazil - 080000474059
Brazil Service Center (BSC) is now open Located in São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil the Brazil Service Center (BSC) has started supporting Business and General Aviation (BGA) customers this month. With this facility, Honeywell will be offering exchange parts in region (SPEX pool) and repair for Displays, ADIRU, TCAS, Weather Radar, NavCom. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/press-release-listing/2019/august/honeywell-opens-its-first-aviation-service-center-in-latin-america]]>.
